channel.title: Comments on: Seriously Awesome Best Battery Charger (for AA & AA batteries)

item.title: By: Dave A
item.dc:creator: Dave A
item.description:
thanks for that, I've had trouble with my batteries and charger recently (particularly for the camera) and was wondering what the problem might be.
Love the look of the display, being able to see the charge is great.
item.content:encoded:
thanks for that, I’ve had trouble with my batteries and charger recently (particularly for the camera) and was wondering what the problem might be.

Love the look of the display, being able to see the charge is great.
